changes.text: Improve the logging for web exceptions (which are often swallowed which makes debugging harder)
Name of the category would not update in the category dropdown box on the search page
Allow searching without a query in the UI
Allow NZBHydra2 to be shown in an iFrame (e.g. organizr)
Increase lengths for columns which may contain very long texts (errors, queries)
Fix bug in wrapper that I introduced in last version. Oh well...
Improve the way the host is determined. External URL should not need to be set when not using a reverse proxy
Make migration a bit more stable
Make sure wrapper is started from correct folder
